bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference
  • News

Count Matrix Accessors

By default, counts() returns the raw counts. Normalized counts, including transcripts per million (TPM) can be accessed using the normalized argument.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
normalized

Select raw counts (FALSE), DESeq2 normalized counts (TRUE), or additional normalization methods:

  • tpm: Transcripts per million.

  • tmm: Trimmed mean of M-values (edgeR).

  • rlog: Regularized log transformation (DESeq2::rlog()).

  • vst: Variance stabilizing transformation (DESeq2::varianceStabilizingTransformation()).

Value

matrix.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# Raw counts (from tximport)
counts(bcb, normalized = FALSE) %>% summary()
#>     group1_1            group1_2           group2_1            group2_2        
#>  Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :0.00e+00   Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :     0.00  
#>  1st Qu.:     0.00   1st Qu.:0.00e+00   1st Qu.:     0.00   1st Qu.:     0.00  
#>  Median :     0.00   Median :0.00e+00   Median :     0.00   Median :     0.00  
#>  Mean   :   573.33   Mean   :1.02e+03   Mean   :   978.47   Mean   :  1114.48  
#>  3rd Qu.:     7.99   3rd Qu.:7.96e+00   3rd Qu.:     9.21   3rd Qu.:     8.02  
#>  Max.   :125708.15   Max.   :1.70e+05   Max.   :172785.31   Max.   :182449.79  

# TPM (from tximport)
counts(bcb, normalized = "tpm") %>% summary()
#>     group1_1            group1_2            group2_1        
#>  Min.   :    0.000   Min.   :    0.000   Min.   :    0.000  
#>  1st Qu.:    0.000   1st Qu.:    0.000   1st Qu.:    0.000  
#>  Median :    0.000   Median :    0.000   Median :    0.000  
#>  Mean   :   53.072   Mean   :   72.537   Mean   :   76.475  
#>  3rd Qu.:    0.186   3rd Qu.:    0.149   3rd Qu.:    0.177  
#>  Max.   :14419.300   Max.   :15656.400   Max.   :16853.700  
#>     group2_2        
#>  Min.   :    0.000  
#>  1st Qu.:    0.000  
#>  Median :    0.000  
#>  Mean   :   86.122  
#>  3rd Qu.:    0.184  
#>  Max.   :17995.900  

# Normalized counts (from DESeq2)
counts(bcb, normalized = TRUE) %>% summary()
#>     group1_1           group1_2            group2_1           group2_2        
#>  Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.00  
#>  1st Qu.:     0.0   1st Qu.:     0.00   1st Qu.:     0.0   1st Qu.:     0.00  
#>  Median :     0.0   Median :     0.00   Median :     0.0   Median :     0.00  
#>  Mean   :   630.7   Mean   :   992.34   Mean   :   935.1   Mean   :  1083.66  
#>  3rd Qu.:     8.8   3rd Qu.:     7.78   3rd Qu.:     8.6   3rd Qu.:     7.78  
#>  Max.   :138282.7   Max.   :165390.03   Max.   :165122.4   Max.   :177406.94  

# rlog (from DESeq2)
counts(bcb, normalized = "rlog") %>% summary()
#>     group1_1         group1_2         group2_1         group2_2     
#>  Min.   :-1.726   Min.   :-1.727   Min.   :-1.727   Min.   :-1.727  
#>  1st Qu.: 0.000   1st Qu.: 0.000   1st Qu.: 0.000   1st Qu.: 0.000  
#>  Median : 0.000   Median : 0.000   Median : 0.000   Median : 0.000  
#>  Mean   : 1.885   Mean   : 1.887   Mean   : 1.888   Mean   : 1.884  
#>  3rd Qu.: 2.993   3rd Qu.: 2.977   3rd Qu.: 2.954   3rd Qu.: 2.997  
#>  Max.   :17.127   Max.   :17.327   Max.   :17.325   Max.   :17.405  

# TMM (from edgeR)
counts(bcb, normalized = "tmm") %>% summary()
#>     group1_1            group1_2           group2_1           group2_2       
#>  Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.0  
#>  1st Qu.:     0.00   1st Qu.:     0.0   1st Qu.:     0.0   1st Qu.:     0.0  
#>  Median :     0.00   Median :     0.0   Median :     0.0   Median :     0.0  
#>  Mean   :  1413.77   Mean   :  2200.7   Mean   :  2082.5   Mean   :  2373.1  
#>  3rd Qu.:    19.71   3rd Qu.:    17.2   3rd Qu.:    19.6   3rd Qu.:    17.1  
#>  Max.   :309985.26   Max.   :366775.7   Max.   :367736.6   Max.   :388504.5  

# VST (from DESeq2)
counts(bcb, normalized = "vst") %>% summary()
#>     group1_1         group1_2         group2_1         group2_2     
#>  Min.   : 5.739   Min.   : 5.739   Min.   : 5.739   Min.   : 5.739  
#>  1st Qu.: 5.739   1st Qu.: 5.739   1st Qu.: 5.739   1st Qu.: 5.739  
#>  Median : 5.739   Median : 5.739   Median : 5.739   Median : 5.739  
#>  Mean   : 6.530   Mean   : 6.531   Mean   : 6.541   Mean   : 6.528  
#>  3rd Qu.: 6.321   3rd Qu.: 6.286   3rd Qu.: 6.314   3rd Qu.: 6.286  
#>  Max.   :17.078   Max.   :17.336   Max.   :17.334   Max.   :17.438
